meanings.definition: To scratch or rub gently, especially in a way that is pleasurable or comforting.
meanings.sent1: She loves when her cat scritches behind the ears.
meanings.sent2: The dog wagged its tail happily as it received scritches from its owner.
meanings.sent3: The toddler giggled uncontrollably during the scritches from their older sibling.
meanings.sent4: The gentle scritches of the massage therapist lulled the client into a state of relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The soft scritches of the feather tickled her skin lightly.
